宝具/特殊能力.name: 『于彼招手的理想乡』
宝具/特殊能力.description: Winds of Avalon. Avalon will endure until the end of humanity. In her perception, Avalon is the 'ideal future in the human heart.' Therefore, she does not seal off the Avalon she inhabits but positions it as an open endpoint for humanity. Her staff points to the horizon’s beyond. It continuously emits light at the farthest end, remaining the 'hope' itself that drives people to journey forth. Thus, she guides. For those who continue to move forward, she ensures they do not stop. For the journey to never end. Upon releasing its True Name, one can see the dreamlike ideal land beyond the horizon her staff points to. From there comes a paradise spring breeze, filled with the scent of flowers, as if it could melt even the frozen absolute sea, accompanied by a clear sense of reality, revealed to those who dream of the ideal land.
